title: Is big data with the cloud computing field growing more compared to other fields? - Quora

response.answer_text: We have loads of cost effective options to store the peta bytes of data in Modern cloud storage and we are yet to migrate lot more data from on-premisis world. Instead of comparing, the right way to say is any fields growth relies on big data analytics. Big data will always survive but tools and framework might vary at different point of time.
